mean_cn: n. 拽；牵引；牵引力；附着磨擦力
mean_en: the action of pulling something along a surface; the power that is used for doing this; a way of treating a broken bone in your body that involves using special equipment to pull the bone gradually back into its correct place; the force that stops something, for example the wheels of a vehicle, from sliding on the ground; the extent to which an idea, a product, etc. becomes popular or gains support
sentence_trans: 车轮被牵引力拖动向前。
word_etyma: tract拉，拖，引 + ion名词后缀 → traction拖，牵引力
